sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime me promener après le dîner.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like to take a walk after dinner.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez attendre patiemment.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please wait patiently.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ měi zhōu dǎsǎo yī cì fángjiān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je nettoie ma chambre une fois par semaine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I clean my room once a week.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle a peur du noir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is afraid of the dark.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cet endroit est très beau.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This place is very beautiful.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Dites-moi la situation concrète.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please tell me the specific situation.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'ascenseur est là-bas.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The elevator is over there.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 公司决定增加员工数量。
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'entreprise a décidé d'augmenter le nombre d'employés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The company decided to increase the number of employees.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我需要去大使馆办签证。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xūyào qù dàshǐguǎn bàn qiānzhèng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je dois aller à l'ambassade pour demander un visa.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I need to go to the embassy to apply for a visa.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a de la fièvre et a besoin de repos.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has a fever and needs rest.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Dàifu shuō wǒ hěn kuài jiù huì hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le médecin dit que je guérirai bientôt.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The doctor said I will get better soon.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīnwǎn yǒu kèrén lái wǒ jiā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Des invités viennent chez moi ce soir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Guests are coming to my house tonight.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le climat ici est très doux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The climate here is very mild.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Y a-t-il une banque à proximité ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Is there a bank nearby?

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 农业是这个国家的主要产业。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nóngyè shì zhège guójiā de zhǔyào chǎnyè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'agriculture est l'industrie principale de ce pays.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Agriculture is the main industry of this country.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bāng wǒ fùyìn zhè fèn wénjiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Aidez-moi à photocopier ce document.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please help me photocopy this document.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 根据天气预报，明天会下雨。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gēnjù tiānqì yùbào, míngtiān huì xià yǔ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Selon les prévisions météo, il pleuvra demain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: According to the weather forecast, it will rain tomorrow.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ils prévoient de se marier l'année prochaine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: They plan to get married next year.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 关于这个问题，我有不同的看法。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Guānyú zhège wèntí, wǒ yǒu bùtóng de kànfǎ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Concernant cette question, j'ai un avis différent.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Regarding this issue, I have a different opinion.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 会议大约需要两个小时。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Huìyì dàyuē xūyào liǎng gè xiǎoshí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La réunion durera environ deux heures.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The meeting will take about two hours.
